Text: Nylon de Mexico SA de CV Deal Number YMarie the counterparty states that the Coverage Ratio should be rather than Will you please confirm that is the correct amount If it is Ill need to correct the original and send the counterparty a revised confirmation Material Adverse Change means a with respect to Counterparty it shall have any of the following occur at any time i the ratio of its Total Debt to Net Worth is more than to or ii its Net Worth falls below US or iii its EBITDA Coverage Ratio shall be less than to or b with respect to ENA its Credit Support Providers Credit Rating is below BBB by SP Thanks for your assistance Gordon

Merger Between Norske Skog Canada Limited and Pacifica Papers IncIt is my understanding that the companies mentioned above have been amalgamated with Norske Skog Canada Limited retaining the name Are you aware that this occurred Norske Skog is wanting me to bill Pacifica Papers swaps under Norske Skogs name going forward Please let me know Thanks Gordon

RE Merger Between Norske Skog Canada Limited and Pacifica Papers IncMarie the counterparty just called and they are interested in closing their old bank accounts but are concerned that we will continue to send it the the old bank account being that we have not moved the Pacifica Papers deals to Norske Skog Please let me know if you have heard from anyone Thanks Gordon Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Tuesday October AM To Rohauer Tanya Radous Paul Cc Heaney Gordon Subject FW Merger Between Norske Skog Canada Limited and Pacifica Papers Inc I never received a response to my email to you re this amalgamation Are there any credit issues with respect to this amalgamation Thanks Marie Original Message From Heaney Gordon Sent Tuesday October AM To Heard Marie Panus Stephanie Bailey Susan Subject Merger Between Norske Skog Canada Limited and Pacifica Papers Inc It is my understanding that the companies mentioned above have been amalgamated with Norske Skog Canada Limited retaining the name Are you aware that this occurred Norske Skog is wanting me to bill Pacifica Papers swaps under Norske Skogs name going forward Please let me know Thanks Gordon

Todays Deal with Grupo Petrotemex SA de CV Cc Agustin Perez is wanting to send out a confirmation for YD currently booked to the old name Petrotemex SA de CV by this afternoon if at all possible Do we have enough lead time to get this out today Thanks Gordon

FW Grupo Petrotemex SA de CV Deal No YD Cc Agustin the confirm for YD was just sent to the counterparty under the name Grupo Petrotemex SA de CV MariePaul Thanks a million for your quick turnaround Regards Gordon Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Thursday October PM To Heaney Gordon Cc Radous Paul Subject Grupo Petrotemex SA de CV Deal No YD Gordon Attached is the Deemed ISDA for the referenced deal together with a fax cover sheet Let me know if you have any questions or need anything else Marie

Todays Deal with Grupo Petrotemex SA de CV Cc Agustin Perez is wanting to send out a confirmation for YD currently booked to the old name Petrotemex SA de CV by this afternoon if at all possible Do we have enough lead time to get this out today Thanks Gordon
Receivable items as of for Pulp and PaperSara I will send you a updated file as soon as possible Regards Gordon
